Ingredients.3: 1 (8 ounce) package tempeh, sliced into 1/4-inch thick slices

Ingredients.5: 0.5 cup Buffalo wing sauce, or to taste

Ingredients.6: 0.5 cup blue cheese salad dressing, or to taste

Directions.1: Whip egg in a bowl for 30 seconds to 1 minute. Pour matzo meal into a separate bowl.

Directions.2: Dip tempeh slices in egg, then coat in matzo meal to coat completely.

Directions.3: Heat oil in a skillet to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Fry breaded tempeh until golden brown, 3 to 5 minutes. Transfer to a plate lined with paper towels to cool briefly.

Directions.4: Transfer tempeh to a bowl and add enough Buffalo wing sauce to cover. Cover bowl and shake until evenly coated. Serve with blue cheese dressing.
